title: Online Learning Design Workshop for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Most learners lack online education experience but possess advanced job-related expertise. Environment supports real-time collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace)

learning_goals: Learners can explain a module design framework applying student-centered pedagogy in online learning environments
Learners can design three or more interactive activities using real-time video conferencing tools to facilitate interaction.
Learners can design project-based assessment tasks and establish a feedback system suitable for project-based evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
